logicalFallacies.name: Appeal to Fear
logicalFallacies.definition: Using fear or threat of negative consequences to persuade rather than logical reasoning.
logicalFallacies.example: Claims immediate danger to children without evidence to pressure quick action.

logicalFallacies.name: False Dilemma
logicalFallacies.definition: Presenting only two options when more alternatives exist.
logicalFallacies.example: Implies you must either act immediately or children will be harmed.
